DataElement.preferredName: Edmonton Frail Scale Referral Made Based on This Score Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator whether a referral was made based on a score.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Edmonton Frail Scale Referral Made Based on This Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An assessment tool designed to be used by clinicians to assess the frailty of older patients. It assesses 10 domains including cognitive impairment and balance and mobility._A question about whether a referral was made based on this score.

Concepts.definition: An assessment tool designed to be used by clinicians to assess the frailty of older patients. It assesses 10 domains including cognitive impairment and balance and mobility.
